text: The Battle of Minisink was a battle of the American Revolutionary War. The British and Iroquois Confederacy defeated the Americans. The Americans were not prepared and had little experience. The battle was at Minisink Ford, New York, on July 22, 1779. It was the only major fight in the northern Delaware Valley. == Related pages == * American Revolutionary War * Mohawk people * New York (state) * Iroquois Category:18th-century battles
title: Battle of Minisink
